bibl.title: The Recently Rediscovered Papyrus Leaves of Didymos the Blind.
bibl.note: Ten leaves of the "Commentary on the Psalms", deposited at Brigham Young University. The papyrus will be edited by T.W. MacKay and C.W. Griggs and published in PTA together with a German translation of the text by Michael Gronewald.
bibl.seg: MacKay Thomas and C. Wilfred Griggs, The Recently Rediscovered Papyrus Leaves of Didymos the Blind.

Ten leaves of the "Commentary on the Psalms", deposited at Brigham Young University. The papyrus will be edited by T.W. MacKay and C.W. Griggs and published in PTA together with a German translation of the text by Michael Gronewald.
